message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I'm willing to sell it to you for $170. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love it.
I'm interested in the product, but $170 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $140 for it.

I understand your concerns, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $140. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $155. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $145 for it.

I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $148 for it.
